fields.comment: which implementation the arc should use
fields.name: type

fields.comment: string name for the material the arc is made of
fields.name: material

fields.comment: remaining number of frames the arc exists
fields.name: lifetime

fields.comment: if 'mArcTarget' points to an existing entity a lighting arc will be created between this entity and 'mArcTarget'
fields.name: mArcTarget
